languages.text: Яростная буря сделала невозможной вокс-связь с кораблем Вольного Торговца. Экспедиция оказалась отрезана от помощи — впрочем, вряд ли надолго. Потеряв связь, офицеры на командном мостике немедленно должны были озаботиться отправкой подмоги.

The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.
languages.original_text: Яростная буря сделала невозможной вокс-связь с кораблем Вольного Торговца. Экспедиция оказалась отрезана от помощи — впрочем, вряд ли надолго. Потеряв связь, офицеры на командном мостике немедленно должны были озаботиться отправкой подмоги.

traits.locale_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

languages.text: 暴风雪肆虐着，探险队无法与行商浪人的舰船建立音阵联系，陷入了孤立无援的境地。不过，这样的情况或许不会持续太久。若是舰桥上的军官发现探险队失去了联系，应该会立即派出救援人员。
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: 暴风雪肆虐着，探险队无法与行商浪人的舰船建立音阵联系，陷入了孤立无援的境地。不过，这样的情况或许不会持续太久。若是舰桥上的军官发现探险队失去了联系，应该会立即派出救援人员。

languages.text: 猛烈な嵐のために自由開拓者のシップとのヴォクス通信を確立することはできず、助けを得られないまま調査隊は立ち往生することになる。だが、おそらく長くは続かない。失踪した偵察部隊と連絡が取れたとなれば、艦橋の将校がただちに救援を派遣してくれるはずだ。
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: 猛烈な嵐のために自由開拓者のシップとのヴォクス通信を確立することはできず、助けを得られないまま調査隊は立ち往生することになる。だが、おそらく長くは続かない。失踪した偵察部隊と連絡が取れたとなれば、艦橋の将校がただちに救援を派遣してくれるはずだ。

languages.text: La fuerte tempestad hace imposible establecer un enlace de voco con la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, por lo que la expedición se encuentra varada a su suerte, pero probablemente no por mucho tiempo. Los oficiales del puente deberían haber enviado refuerzos en cuanto se perdió el contacto con el grupo de exploración.
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: La fuerte tempestad hace imposible establecer un enlace de voco con la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, por lo que la expedición se encuentra varada a su suerte, pero probablemente no por mucho tiempo. Los oficiales del puente deberían haber enviado refuerzos en cuanto se perdió el contacto con el grupo de exploración.

languages.text: La tempête qui fait rage empêche d'établir une liaison-vox avec le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. L'expédition est isolée, mais probablement pas pour longtemps : les officiers de la passerelle ont certainement envoyé de l'aide dès qu'ils ont perdu le contact avec l'équipe de reconnaissance.
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: La tempête qui fait rage empêche d'établir une liaison-vox avec le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. L'expédition est isolée, mais probablement pas pour longtemps : les officiers de la passerelle ont certainement envoyé de l'aide dès qu'ils ont perdu le contact avec l'équipe de reconnaissance.

languages.text: Der tobende Sturm macht es unmöglich, eine Vox-Verbindung mit dem Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu etablieren, womit die Expedition ohne Unterstützung gestrandet ist, wahrscheinlich aber nicht für lange – die Offiziere auf der Brücke sollen sofort Hilfe entsenden, wenn der Kontakt zum Spähtrupp abbricht.
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: Der tobende Sturm macht es unmöglich, eine Vox-Verbindung mit dem Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu etablieren, womit die Expedition ohne Unterstützung gestrandet ist, wahrscheinlich aber nicht für lange – die Offiziere auf der Brücke sollen sofort Hilfe entsenden, wenn der Kontakt zum Spähtrupp abbricht.

languages.text: Şiddetli fırtınanın Hür Tacir'in gemisiyle voks hattı kurmayı imkânsızlaştırması, muhtemelen kısa bir süreliğine olsa da keşif grubunu yardıma muhtaç hâlde bırakıyor. Köprüdeki subaylar, keşif grubuyla iletişim kesilir kesilmez yardım ekibi göndermiştir.
languages.original_text: The raging storm makes it impossible to establish a vox-link with the Rogue Trader's vessel, leaving the expedition stranded without aid, but probably not for long — the officers on the bridge should have immediately dispatched help as soon as contact with the scouting party was lost.

traits.locale_text: Şiddetli fırtına, Hür Tacir'in gemisiyle voks hattı kurmayı imkânsızlaştırıyordu, keşif yardıma muhtaç şekilde terk edilmiş bir hâldeydi. Fakat bu, muhtemelen uzun sürmeyecekti. Köprüdeki subaylar, keşif grubuyla iletişim kesilir kesilmez bir yardım ekibi göndermiş olmalıydı.
